body:
It's been a really long time since I've done one of these and since I have left the server,I feel like I should make a fresh start and make one more AMA,so ask away :D Absolutely anything can be asked and I will try to answer in the best way possible,please do not make sensitive questions such as:
E.g:Have you lost your virginity yet?(Sorry if this is inappropriate)

title: Tekky's AMA

replies.body:
How did you come up with your name?
It seems very unique.
